snippet: Records from the New York City Commission on Human Rights include the file of Agnes Bunn, who complained that she was turned away from a Trump building in 1970 because she was black. Documents in the file included the report of a white tester who ...
lead_paragraph: Records from the New York City Commission on Human Rights include the file of Agnes Bunn, who complained that she was turned away from a Trump building in 1970 because she was black. Documents in the file included the report of a white tester who said he was offered an apartment in the building.

headline.main: The Complaint File of Agnes Bunn
